page.title: 11Abbotsley Sunday School
page.content: Mrs.Harding started Sunday School in about 1979.Three years running,we have gone on a trip to the 'Ely Children's Festival'.This year we stopped at Landbeach and we boated,swam and played.Every week we collect money and some of it goes to charity.We work for ribbons with medals on.There are about 20 people in it and each child has an old person to care for and we go and talk to them and make them presents.At Sunday School you hardly get told off because the teachers are too kind.It lasts an hour from 11.15-12.15. We rent the village hall for our meetings. Sunday School has been going about 6 years now and Mrs. Harding has always been in charge. About 4 years ago Mrs.Beard moved to the village so she helps now.
